info.title: IWA-Express - Express JS API API
info.description: This is the API for IWAExpress (Insecure Web App) Pharmacy Direct an insecure NodeJS/Express web application documented with Swagger

get.description: Get the site message of the day
Check if a user with the specified email already exists in the site

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address to check. Cannot be empty.

post.description: Register a new user with the site
Subscribe a new user to the newsletter
Sign in as an authorised user
Compress and backup the newsletter database to the specified file

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: The file to backup the database to. Cannot be empty.

get.description: Gets all existing users searching by %keyword% format

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keyword(s) search for users to be found.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the starting record. 0 indicates the first record.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum records to return. The maximum value allowed is 50.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the user to be retrieved. Cannot be empty.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the user to be updated. Cannot be empty.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the user to be deleted. Cannot be empty.

get.description: Gets an existing user using a MongoDb Query
Gets all existing products searching by %keyword% format

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keyword(s) search for products to be found.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the starting record. 0 indicates the first record.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum records to return. The maximum value allowed is 50.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the product to be retrieved. Cannot be empty.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the product to be updated. Cannot be empty.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the product to be deleted. Cannot be empty.

get.description: Gets an existing product's image by its Id

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Id of the product image to be retrieved. Cannot be empty.

get.description: Gets an existing product's image by its uploaded name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the product image to be retrieved. Cannot be empty.

description.example: This is an example description of the product.
